title: Informes y Auditoría Web
prompt:
Create a web screen for 'Pantalla de Informes (PDF)' based on the description in {{DATA:TEXT:TEXT_2}}. The screen should be a desktop version following the design theme {{DATA:THEME:THEME_4}}. 
Key features:
- Navigation sidebar (similar to {{DATA:SCREEN:SCREEN_9}} and {{DATA:SCREEN:SCREEN_3}}).
- Section title: 'Informes y Auditoría'.
- Filtering options: Selectors for Empresa, Unidad de Negocio, Punto de Venta, and Date Range.
- Data output preview: A professional-looking summary or table showing records from SQL Views (active records only).
- Export actions: High-visibility buttons to 'Generar PDF' and 'Exportar Excel' using the neon green accent color.
- KPI summary: Total monthly/annual figures.
- Style: Dark mode, rounded corners (iOS-style), clean professional UI.
name: projects/18266581404286886305/screens/fa814594872d4d8c92d36a42f9251159
